Plot: The story of how an eccentric French shop-keeper and amateur film-maker attempted to locate and befriend Banksy, only to have the artist turn the camera back on its owner. The film contains...
Title: Exit Through the Gift Shop
Actors: Banksy, Mr. Brainwash, Debora Guetta, Space Invader
tomatoConsensus: An amusing, engrossing look at underground art, Exit Through the Gift Shop entertains as it deflates the myths and hype surrounding its subjects.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 24 wins & 27 nominations.
